pageContext.claim: “I saved Lima. You know I came here and they were going to close that plant in Lima. They were going to close the tank plant, right? It was done and I said, why are we closing a tank plant? ...And I looked at this Army tank plant in Lima and I said, why we're closing it? And I saw the people building the tanks and the technology is incredible. And if you ever closed it, you'll never be able to open a thing like that again. So I overrode the Generals, I overrode everybody.”
pageContext.analysis: This story is a fantasy, Trump has steered more funding to this tank plant in Ohio, but it was never in danger of closing.
